NewsArticle.Title: Unregistered Play
NewsArticle.Content:
Starting on December 10th, all characters on unregistered accounts can log onto Dark Ages and play for an unlimited time. Unregistered characters will have the following restrictions,
-If the unregistered character is level 99, they cannot gain experience, ability points, hit points, mana points, or stats.
-Cannot earn rewards from level 99 quests or Medenian quests.
-Cannot participate in some Kru events such as the Eulogy, Oren Ball, Merriest of Dreams,etc.
-Cannot participate in some game features such as politics, religion, contests, etc.
